data.name: Page.RemoveAndNominate
data.value: You have removed {0} from {1}. We've sent an email to {2} asking them to apply to be an approved person.

data.name: Page.Heading
data.value: What you need to do next

data.name: Content.WhenAccountIsCreated
data.value: Once {0} has made an application to change their account permissions to submit data, you will need to accept or reject the request.

data.name: Content.DoesNotApply
data.value: If {0} does not apply to be an approved user, you will need to contact them.
